snippet: To avoid paying fines for traffic violations, Hassaun McFarlan recited the title of his girlfriend, the chief of staff to the first lady of New York City.
abstract: Hassaun McFarlan, boyfriend of Rachel Noerdlinger, chief of staff to New York City's First Lady Chirlane McCray, twice invoked Noerdlinger’s position in attempts to avoid paying fines for traffic violations he incurred in 2014 while driving her car; McFarlan's behavior has been an ongoing problem for Noerdlinger, who did not disclose on an official city background form that she shared a home with him in Edgewater, NJ.
lead_paragraph: To avoid paying fines for traffic violations, Hassaun McFarlan recited the title of his girlfriend, the chief of staff to the first lady of New York City.

headline.main: Boyfriend of Noerdlinger, Top City Hall Aide, Cited Her to Fight Tickets
headline.print_headline: Boyfriend of City Hall Aide Cited Her to Fight Tickets
